title: (x) A House Industries font? 'de Piramide': dancing fun slab - Minya Nouvelle {Rainer}
content:
Isn't this one of the House Industries "Funny" fonts? It's not Countryhouse or one of the other rather well-knowns...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019035529im_/http:/typophile.com/files/boek3a_3730.jpg)
author: Theunis de Jong
